evidence.claim: The Carefullist utilizes AWS for hosting its applications.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, ensuring the protection of sensitive health information.
Carefullist supports HL7 standards for health data exchange, facilitating interoperability in health tech.
They mention using Google Cloud Platform services for data storage and processing.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 transactions or relevant API use cases found.
